original_title: Makumbura Multimodal Center receives record number of passengers
original_body_lines: The Makumbura Multimodal Center (MMC) yesterday recorded the highest number of passengers, its management said.
It said a large number of passengers arrived at the MMC and there was a huge demand for places like Tangalle, Hambantota, Elpitiya, Deniaya, Kataragama, Badulla and Ampara.

The Sri Lanka Transport Board (SLTB), and the National Transport Commission (NTC) made a huge commitment to provide sufficient luxury buses to cater to the demands. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
